Title: Does This Product Match The Query?
Summary: Easily accessible instructions in the UI
Description: Popover instructions.  What more could you ask for?
Reviews: This is an awful tool that doesn't help me at all.  Kind of like working with Brian Hazell.

Title: Pick the Best Product Group
Summary: Iterate through a cell and populate it as separate items in your UI
Description: Your gonna wanna take a seat for this. Imagine you've got a bunch of data in 1 cell. Why only have 1 item in a cell when you can have bunch? Its a party in that cell. But here's the stinker, when you upload the cell into CF, all those sweet items are gonna get vomitted onto the UI as just one blob of data. Pffff.....No thanks! But heres the answer, For Loops! Liquid for loops to be exact. By implementing a terrific for loop into your design (and splitting your data in the UI) you can split up each item into its own space in the ui? Say what? you heard me right, take your data, split up into multiple items, and friggin display it in your job. Have fun tracking down your socks cuz they just got knocked Off!!
Reviews: This is the best thing since slided bread! and I'm a baker so that's saying something

Title: Verify Website And Find 'Contact Us' Url. (Updated)
Summary: Populate information based on what's available in the data set
Description: OK so you got some data right? Columns, headers, rows, lines, you know what I'm talking about. But let's say in your data you got some holes? Like made for some columns you don't have info for every row. An example that comes to mind is a good ol fashion business listing csv. You got some business names, phones, nubmers and some address info. But! maybe you don't have the zip for all the business because some intern slacked off?? What you gonna do just display the data as 'No Data Available' in the job UI? You'll be the laughing stock of the contributor community! Save your self the embarrasment, by using some liquid condionals so that zip won't display if its missing. It's like Magic!!!
Reviews: Wow, this is exactly what I was looking for. I'm glad I don't have to do this boring job and have others do it.

Title: Categorize Sports Images
Summary: Use the taxonomy widget to simply show many categories and subcategories
Description: Have images? Want categories? Don't have time to deal with it? Use this taxonomy widget to BLOW through all that data and get on with your life. No one wants to work on a computer all day anyways.
Reviews:
I LOVE THIS SO MUCH I USE IT FOR EVERY JOB
This job was super easy to use! +1

Title: Categorize these Companies
Summary: Gives valuable information next to each CML question without having to scroll to the instructions
Description: Use these tabs to show descriptions of categories you're looking for. Can be customized to fit any job requirements and design.
Reviews:
Saved me at least 3 minutes
Helped me with all my survey questions I shouldn't be running on CF anyways!

Title: Identify The Birthday of Famous And Not-So Famous People
Summary: Collect dates using a custom date picker!
Description: Everyone has a birthday, why not find those birthday's for people you don't even know! We can help you lurk the internet for birthdays using this handy date picker! Have contributor answer's be formatted exactly how you would like. HAPPY LURKING!
Reviews:
I found my ex in within days, thanks!
Perfect for lurking when you just don't have the time.

Title: Randomize Answer Options
Description: Use this seed to randomize your radio options to trip up contributors

Title: Zoom, Rotate, And Pan Images
Summary: Allows the contributor to zoom in on an image, rotate it, and drag it around in its frame
Description: Are your images TOO SMALL? make them BIGGER with this handy tool! zOo0M!! ROtate! PAN!!!!
Reviews: Despite the name, this is not a ~drag~ at all!!!!!!!!

Title: Autocomplete Things
Description: Got a long list of things? Want them to be suggested to you while you type, sorta like a text-based Clippy? Use this!
Reviews: I've been missing Clippy since '98 but now I feel like he's back, only without a face!

Title: Categorize Sports Images
Summary: Make images, tweets or text scoll with the page to easily answer many questions per item
Description: Have a boat load of questions to ask? Are some of them not even needed? Do you want to ask them anyways? Sure you do. Use this scrolling widget to keep your image, tweet or random video next to all those questions in your job.
Reviews:
Makes life so much easier for the contributors!
What a tool! Just like Hazell.
